text: Barbara Nash (born 1903, date of death unknown) was a South African swimmer. She competed in the women's 100 metre freestyle and women's 300 metre freestyle events at the 1920 Summer Olympics. She was the first woman to represent South Africa at the Olympics. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:Year of death missing Category:South African female swimmers Category:South African female freestyle swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of South Africa Category:Swimmers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Barbara Nash
